body:
> No longer have a unique name or the slug is generated automatically?

No longer have a unique name. In its place where we need it I'm using the recipe ID, which is unique, but not nearly as human-readable. For add-on studies, we expected the add-on itself to contain the slug that annotates pings in telemetry, so Normandy doesn't actually need to know what the slug is.

If we do want a unique, non-numeric slug, I can add one back in, although I'd be worried about making sure the slug matches what the add-on is telling telemetry the experiment slug is.
